SELECT count(*) FROM eqi_device AS dev LEFT JOIN eqi_equipment AS eqi ON dev.equipment_int=eqi.equipment_int
and eqi.equipment_id like '%${equipmentId}%'
and dev.app_id like '%${APPId}%'

SELECT vo.* from (SELECT dev.device_id, dev.app_id, dev.version, dev.`enable`, dev.register_status, dev.device_software_type, dev.device_name, bai.acc_point_res_name, bfi.factory_name, eqi.equipment_int, eqi.equipment_id, eqi.equipment_ip, eqi.equipment_continue_port, bpi.process_name, eqi.equipment_install_location, dev.access_method, dev.remarks, cur.USER_NAME AS createName, dev.create_time, bei.equip_type_name, bei.protocol_communication, dev.program_installation_path, dev.executor_installation_path, upd.upload_id, if(dev.version < upd.version, "是", "否")as need_update FROM eqi_device AS dev LEFT JOIN eqi_equipment AS eqi ON dev.equipment_int=eqi.equipment_int LEFT JOIN base_access_info AS bai ON eqi.acc_point_res_id = bai.acc_point_res_id LEFT JOIN base_process_info AS bpi ON bai.process_id = bpi.process_id LEFT JOIN base_factory_info AS bfi ON bpi.factory_id = bfi.factory_id LEFT JOIN base_equip_info AS bei ON eqi.equip_type_id= bei.equip_type_id LEFT JOIN upd_upload AS upd ON dev.device_software_type = upd.device_so_type LEFT JOIN cap_user AS cur ON dev.creator = cur.USER_ID order by upd.version_upload_time desc) as vo
and vo.equipment_id like '%${equipmentId}%'
and vo.device_software_type like '%${deviceSoftwareType}%'
and vo.enable like '%${enable}%'
and vo.device_name like '%${deviceName}%'
and vo.process_name like '%${processName}%'
and vo.factory_name like '%${factoryName}%'
and vo.version like '%${version}%'
and vo.need_update like '%${needUpdate}%'
and vo.register_status like '%${registerStatus}%'
and vo.program_installation_path like '%${programInstallationPath}%'
and vo.create_time like '%${createTime}%'
GROUP BY vo.device_id
order by ${field} ${order}
limit ${begin},${limit}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT * from (SELECT dev.device_id, dev.app_id, dev.version, dev.`enable`, dev.register_status, dev.device_software_type, dev.device_name, bai.acc_point_res_name, bfi.factory_name, eqi.equipment_int, eqi.equipment_id, eqi.equipment_ip, eqi.equipment_continue_port, bpi.process_name, eqi.equipment_install_location, dev.access_method, dev.remarks, cur.USER_NAME AS createName, dev.create_time, bei.equip_type_name, bei.protocol_communication, dev.program_installation_path, dev.executor_installation_path, upd.upload_id, if(dev.version < upd.version, "是", "否")as need_update FROM eqi_device AS dev LEFT JOIN eqi_equipment AS eqi ON dev.equipment_int=eqi.equipment_int LEFT JOIN base_access_info AS bai ON eqi.acc_point_res_id = bai.acc_point_res_id LEFT JOIN base_process_info AS bpi ON bai.process_id = bpi.process_id LEFT JOIN base_factory_info AS bfi ON bpi.factory_id = bfi.factory_id LEFT JOIN base_equip_info AS bei ON eqi.equip_type_id= bei.equip_type_id LEFT JOIN upd_upload AS upd ON dev.device_software_type = upd.device_so_type LEFT JOIN cap_user AS cur ON dev.creator = cur.USER_ID order by upd.version_upload_time desc) as vo
and vo.equipment_id like '%${equipmentId}%'
and vo.device_software_type like '%${deviceSoftwareType}%'
and vo.enable like '%${enable}%'
and vo.device_name like '%${deviceName}%'
and vo.process_name like '%${processName}%'
and vo.factory_name like '%${factoryName}%'
and vo.version like '%${version}%'
and vo.need_update like '%${needUpdate}%'
and vo.register_status like '%${registerStatus}%'
and vo.program_installation_path like '%${programInstallationPath}%'
and vo.create_time like '%${createTime}%'
GROUP BY vo.device_id) AS vdi;
